name: Abundant Life Academy
overview:
Abundant Life Academy is an evangelical Christian boarding school designed for teens who are struggling. The goal of Abundant Life Academy is to provide teens and their families with the tools and resources to succeed and thrive academically, relationally and spiritually, equipping them to live a life of love, acceptance and forgiveness as modeled by Biblical principles and the life of Jesus Christ.

Our year-round enrollment serves both girls and boys ages 13-17 in separate facilities. ALA is a boarding school designed for teenagers that are:

Emotionally immature
Making poor personal choices
Acting entitled
Struggling with self-image or self-worth
Manipulating their family and others
Playing the victim
Lying, sneaking out, isolating from family
Experimenting with sex, alcohol, and drugs
Rebelling against parental authority
Making poor peer choices
Academically unmotivated.

Our therapeutic program provides early intervention for struggling boys and girls. We believe, and teach, that Jesus is the only answer for restoration, and aim for a restored relationship between the teen and their entire family. Our boarding school program offers:

Academic Restoration Programs
Parent Coaching
Dedicated Parent Advocates
Aftercare
Traditional Therapy
Braincore Therapy
Celebrate Recovery
Equine Therapy & Horsemanship
Athletics
Mercy Mission Trips
